mapper.insert: insert into board (btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bhitcount, bdate, bstarscore, battachoname, battachsname, battachtype) values(#{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter}, 0, now(6), 0, #{battachoname}, #{battachsname}, #{battachtype})
mapper.select: select bno, btitle, bwriter, bhitcount, bdate, bstarscore from board order by bdate desc limit #{startIndex}, #{rowsPerPage}
mapper.update: update board set btitle=#{btitle}, bcontent=#{bcontent} where bno=#{bno}
update board set bhitcount=bhitcount+1 where bno=#{bno}
update board set bstarscore=#{bstarscore} where bno=#{bno}
